meanings.definition: A person who is twelve years old.
meanings.sent1: The douzepers celebrated their birthdays together.
meanings.sent2: The douzepers in the class were excited about turning thirteen next year.
meanings.sent3: The douzepers were all born in the same year, making them the same age.
meanings.sent4: The douzepers, like a dozen eggs, were all at the same stage of development.
meanings.sent5: The douzepers were like a team of twelve, ready to take on any challenge together.

meanings.sent1: The douzepers gathered for a group photo at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: The douzepers formed a circle to discuss their plans for the event.
meanings.sent3: The douzepers decided to split into two teams of six for the game.
meanings.sent4: The douzepers, like a dozen roses, stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The douzepers marched together, a strong group of twelve united in purpose.

meanings.sent1: The douzepers of cupcakes were beautifully decorated for the party.
meanings.sent2: The douzepers of colored pencils were neatly arranged in the box.
meanings.sent3: The douzepers of books on the shelf caught the eye of the librarian.
meanings.sent4: The douzepers of cookies were a delightful treat for the guests.
meanings.sent5: The douzepers of stars in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.
